data.content:
noun
the breaking point
US or Brit breaking point
the time when a person can no longer accept or deal with a situation because of too much pressure or stress
My nerves were at the breaking point. = I had just about reached the breaking point.
My boss is pushing me to the breaking point.
the time when a situation has become so difficult, dangerous, etc., that it cannot continue
Tensions between the two groups had reached the breaking point.
